title: Incase you've forgotten
body:
Malzahar is OP.
Just wait until he see's competitive play.

replies.body: Except he won't see competitive play for the simple fact that the counter play is team work, something that competitive play has a lot of.

Pretty much. Malzahar loses his pressure when people pair up all the time. Unless they're not completely shit or that Malzahar is really fed it's really hard to 1v2. 1v1? Easy piece of cake.
That's until everyone buys QSS for you.
